c512e7f0-91ad-4762-80eb-b93abe073e30.description: The Microsoft Learn Student Ambassador Mentor badge is earned through involvement as a mentor, helping fellow students learn, lead, and empower their communities with technology. Those who earned this badge demonstrated commitment in welcoming and guiding their mentees through technical upskill and connecting them to diverse Microsoft products and opportunities.
c512e7f0-91ad-4762-80eb-b93abe073e30.name: Microsoft Learn Student Ambassador Mentor

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Next Generation Experiences

badge_template_activities.title: The Microsoft Learn Student Ambassador Mentor badge is earned through involvement as a mentor, helping fellow students learn, lead, and empower their communities with technology. Those who earned this badge demonstrated commitment in guiding their mentees through technical upskilling and connecting them to diverse Microsoft products and opportunities.

b56c5d9e-a4e1-47bc-9fec-27456a09ba5e.description: The Microsoft Ignite After Party Host badge is earned by Microsoft Most Valuable Professionals (MVPs), Regional Directors (RDs), and User Group Community Leaders. Those who earned this badge hosted an After Party following Microsoft Ignite, sparking conversations around a pre-selected topic, bringing Microsoft Ignite content closer to their local communities.
b56c5d9e-a4e1-47bc-9fec-27456a09ba5e.name: Microsoft Ignite After Party Host

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Next Generation Experiences

badge_template_activities.title: The Microsoft Ignite After Party Host badge is earned by Microsoft Most Valuable Professionals (MVPs), Regional Directors (RDs), and User Group Community Leaders. Those who earned this badge hosted an After Party following Microsoft Ignite, sparking conversations around a pre-selected topic, bringing Microsoft Ignite content closer to their local communities.

a898de03-936f-4ee9-87ba-067fac4ca044.description: The Microsoft Learn Student Ambassador Mentee badge is earned through involvement as a mentee in a Microsoft Learn Student Ambassador mentorship program learning how to lead and empower their communities with technology. Those who earned this badge demonstrated commitment in technical upskilling and being connected to diverse Microsoft products and opportunities.
a898de03-936f-4ee9-87ba-067fac4ca044.name: Microsoft Learn Student Ambassador Mentee

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Next Generation Experiences

badge_template_activities.title: The Microsoft Learn Student Ambassador Mentee badge is earned through completion of a 3–6-month direct mentorship engagement with mentors who prepared them to become the Next Generation of Developers. Microsoft Student Ambassadors were coached by their mentors to pursue greater opportunities, gain leadership skills, and learn how to effectively collaborate to empower every developer in their community to achieve more.

123f9cf9-2270-4857-b9b5-531c2846376e.description: Social Impact Projects aim to engage Student Ambassadors globally in technical projects and team building. Students are given 3 months to complete their project. The outcome of the project depends on the project type and social impact topic. Content Creation projects require teams to collaborate to create intro-to content for Learn, Docs and Blogs as well as build skilling content. Education leads guide their teammates in creating innovations that change the way students around the globe learn.
123f9cf9-2270-4857-b9b5-531c2846376e.name: Content Creation: Education

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Next Generation Experiences

d9a1cb64-e8c8-4faa-a89f-e5c67ccdaf09.description: Social Impact Projects aim to engage Student Ambassadors globally in technical projects and team building. Students are given 3 months to complete their project. The outcome of the project depends on the project type and social impact topic. Content Creation projects require teams to collaborate to create intro-to content for Learn, Docs and Blogs as well as build skilling content. Green Tech teams work to create solutions for sustainability, climate change, agriculture, etc.
d9a1cb64-e8c8-4faa-a89f-e5c67ccdaf09.name: Content Creation: Green Tech

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Next Generation Experiences

0c5fb3b2-c271-4369-87dc-ce5274514c90.description: Team Leads define the direction for the team and create and maintain a team task breakdown using GitHub Projects. Leads engage their teammates with monthly updates in their projects related social impact league channel. Social Impact Projects team leads are tasked with ensuring the project's completion and overall success of their team. Education team leads guide their teams in creating innovations that change the way students around the globe learn.
0c5fb3b2-c271-4369-87dc-ce5274514c90.name: Content Creation: Education Lead

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Next Generation Experiences

Students are given 3 months to complete their project. The outcome of the project depends on the project type and social impact topic. Prototype Sprint projects require teams to collaborate to go from identifying a problem to creating an early prototype. Digital Accessibility teams work to create solutions that meet the needs of diverse communities.
